product.title: Bears on Wheels | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Stan and Jan Berenstain’s Bears on Wheels poses a curious question—How many bears on wheels are there? The unexpected answers keep children wondering as they wait for one little bear on a wheel to finish his ride. But on top of all the fun, Stan and Jan Berenstain’s Bears on Wheels introduces number and counting concepts with pictures and simple words that are sure to keep even the youngest reader engaged.

Tie-in Activity: Play a balancing and counting game with your child. How many stuffed animals can you stack on a toy truck before the animals tumble? Count as you go along—then try to beat the record.
